programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep253
programme.desc: Jolly Lodgers / Biddy Sitting - Squidward packs his bags after his house gets infested, but a different kind of pest waits at his hotel. // SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Grill is Gone - When a gang of kids steals the Krusty Krab's grill, SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs go to extreme lengths to win it back.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Winter Solstice Part 1: The Spirit World - Aang, Katara, and Sokka arrive at a town being terrorized by a mysterious force from the spirit world. Aang doesnt know how to help these people, and realizes he has much to learn about being the Avatar.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Born to Be Mild - Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Strife Coach / Gossip Girl - Ronnie Anne and her friends help get Mrs. Kernicky hired as the new PE coach, but her classes are no joke! // When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Bend It Like Abuelo / Bunstoppable - Hector finally joins his dream soccer team as their good luck charm, but what happens when his luck runs out? // While preparing bao for the Chinese Cultural Fair, Sid and Adelaide face off against time-hopping bandits!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Patterfly Effect / A Space Affair to Remember - Patrick messes with the space-time continuum. // While Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space, Patrick and Squidina throw a house party.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep255
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 2 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep245
programme.desc: Gary's Got Legs - Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Painting with Squidward / Kamp Kow - Counselor Squidward is determined for his cabin to win the annual camp art competition. // The Kamp Koral campers befriend a cute cow with a big appetite.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Can't Hardly Wait / A Mutt Above - Lori takes a waitressing job at Dad's restaurant, but it turns out that serving is harder than she anticipated. // Spurred on by a classmate's mocking about Charles, Lana decides to train him to compete in a local dog show.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Kings of the Con - Eager to be named Kings of the Con at the Ace Savvy convention, Lincoln and Clyde convince the sisters to go with them as the Full Deck. // But the girls get more attention, leading the boys to do whatever it takes to gain focus.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Sister Act / House Flip - To get out of doing things they don't like, Lana and Lola secretly switch places and pretend to be the other. // After causing Flip to get hurt, the kids sneak him into the attic to care for him without Mom and Dad knowing.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Fandom Pains / Rita Her Rights - Lucy is annoyed that Lori and Leni have started watching her vampire show because of a cute new character. // After getting community service for racking up tickets, Mom finds it's more relaxing than being at home.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep223
programme.desc: Sanitation Insanity / Bunny Hunt - When Mr. Krabs gets in trouble for littering, he makes SpongeBob and Squidward clean up Bikini Bottom. // A sea bunny ravages Squidward's garden, but SpongeBob thinks it's cute!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Call the Cops! / Surf N' Turf - Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back. // Sandy struggles to build a ship-in-a-bottle before a big contest, so SpongeBob calls in a little extra help.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep244
programme.desc: Pineapple RV - SpongeBob and Patrick turn the pineapple into a mobile home to take Squidward on the road trip he deserves.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars - SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Winter Solstice Part 2: Avatar Roku - During the winter solstice, Aang must reach a Fire Nation temple while dodging Prince Zuko, Commander Zhao, and the Fire Sages who guard it.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep412
programme.desc: A Pimple Plan - Luan wakes up with a pimple on the day of her first date with Benny, so she turns to the siblings for help.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Schooled! Part 1 - Lincoln tries to swap middle school classes after being separated from the gang, but ends up being transferred to Canada. Lori doesn't fit in on any of the college dorm floors. Mom and Dad rush to potty train Lily for preschool.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep503
programme.desc: The Boss Maybe / Family Bonding - Now the oldest in the house, Leni struggles to follow in Lori's footsteps as the family's babysitter. // Secret agents Lincoln and Clyde investigate the Loud's suspicious new neighbors.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep260
programme.desc: Knock Knock, Who's There? / Pat Hearts Squid - SpongeBob watches Mr. Krabs's house while he's away, so he takes extreme measures to make sure no one breaks in. // Squidward is forced to room with Patrick, but his domineering demeanor rubs off on Patrick more than he'd like.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep261
programme.desc: Lighthouse Louie / Hiccup Plague - SpongeBob cleans out the boating school lighthouse, where he finds a cute but inconvenient companion. // No one in Bikini Bottom is safe from a case of contagious hiccups.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep262
programme.desc: A Cabin in the Kelp / The Hankering - The Gal Pals take Pearl to a cabin in the woods for a weekend of silly pranks. // Mr. Krabs has a secret taste for something surprising.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep263
programme.desc: Who R Zoo? / The Kwarantined Krab - SpongeBob and Patrick create their own zoo made entirely of bubbles! // The Krusty Krab goes under emergency quarantine, but no one knows who carries the mysterious illness.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep244
programme.desc: The Krusty Slammer / Pineapple RV - Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into a jailhouse after Plankton breaks the law, but crime only pays for so long. // SpongeBob and Patrick turn the pineapple into a mobile home to take Squidward on the road trip he deserves.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep172
programme.desc: Face Freeze - SpongeBob and Patrick make a bet to see who can hold a "funny face" the longest...then their faces freeze that way!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Secret Admirer - When Po's fake love letter prank on Monkey backfires, the duo's relationship is put to the test in a story of jealousy, betrayal and, yes, even kidnapping.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Invitation Only - Po is sad when he learns that everyone has been invited to a dinner party except for him, due to his poor table manners. Will Shifu be able to teach Po proper etiquette AND foil the attack of evil Temutai and his army?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Sozin's Comet Part 2: The Old Masters - The gang find Iroh with June's help. Iroh suggests that Zuko challenge Azula for the position of Fire Lord, with Katara to help. The others decide to intercept the airship fleet.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Action Reaction - Skipper is forced to live his worst nightmare when he's doused with Inflatium and stress causes him to blow up like a balloon.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Operation: Swap-anzee / Snowmageddon - The Space Agency sends Private to the moon. His ticket is downgraded to one-way and the other birds can't monkey around if they hope to get him home again. // Snowmageddon hits and traps Skipper and Marlene in the convenience store with X.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Tunnel of Love / Skipper Makes Perfect - When a sneeze from Rico causes the underground tunnel system beneath the zoo to rupture Skipper calls in 4 beavers to fix the situation. // Skipper's having one of those perfect days, and he decides to use the opportunity to settle an old score.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Sporty Parker / Hammy Time - Parker makes the Yellow Springs soccer team, which thrills Angus since he never had the chance to play growing up. // Parker brings home a hamster the Middlemost Post falls in love with, but this love quickly turns to jealousy.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Headband - Mistaken for a Fire Nation School student, the disguised Aang is forced to enroll in a Fire nation school. Aang's hair helped to disguise him better with his head band.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep303
programme.desc: The Painted Lady - When the gang comes to a suffering fishing village, a mysterious spirit appears to help the villagers.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Spoiler Alert / Something Fishy - The twins go to great lengths to protect Best's enjoyment of his book and realize spoilers aren't so bad after all. // Best and Bester may have jumped the line for the new fish restaurant, but once inside things take a dramatic turn.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a brave and fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Amid the push for private boys' schools to go co-educational, we investigate if these institutions are safe places for girls. Louise Milligan exposes new allegations, speaking to former staff, and examines a wider history.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep43
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep63
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Strait To The Plate Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Aaron Fa'Aoso visits Dauan Island to connect with his roots, gather local ingredients and cook using their famous granite in amaypit cooking.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Tiana and Sam are joined by former Australian Opal, Tongan Eva Afeaki and Cook Island ex-NRL player, Tinirau Arona. Penrith Panthers talk about the team's Pasifika Jersey, plus PNG boxers Allan Oaike and Sheilla Yama.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep87
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep47
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep63
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep35
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The World Ep51
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Now at the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news from correspondents and guests.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sibling golf superstars Minjee and Min Woo Lee are like chalk and cheese, but they share the same goal - to be World No 1.

programme.title: Project Wild Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Dr Ann Jones travels through the Indo-Pacific region to find the dedicated people bringing our planet's amazing animals, plants and ecosystems back from the brink. This time she visits biodiversity-rich Cambodia.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Food Trail Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Luke explores the different cuisine and styles of restaurants around Hong Kong.

programme.title: Khanh Ong's Wild Food Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Chef Khanh Ong explores Eyre Peninsula, South Australia. In shark infested waters he conquers his fears and jumps in to learn how to hunt underwater. Locals teach him how to spear fish and four-wheel drive through sand dunes.

programme.title: Strait To The Plate Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Aaron Fa'Aoso visits Dauan Island to connect with his roots, gather local ingredients and cook using their famous granite in amaypit cooking.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep63
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep47
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a brave and fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Tiana and Sam are joined by former Australian Opal, Tongan Eva Afeaki and Cook Island ex-NRL player, Tinirau Arona. Penrith Panthers talk about the team's Pasifika Jersey, plus PNG boxers Allan Oaike and Sheilla Yama.

programme.title: Dream Gardens Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Simon and Fleur Ansell relish mid-century modern architecture. They have the house, now they want the garden to match. But can they create a contemporary design in sync with its vintage roots?

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep39
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Guest presenter Hannah Maloney introduces her gorgeous goats, Millie Ross learns the art of fermentation, Tino Carnevale visits a grand country garden, and guest presenter Craig Miller-Randle propagates indoor plants.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep63

programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep507AdrianYanezCubSwansonJoeLauzon
programme.desc: Adrian Yanez opens up about the loss of his father and coach and how tragedy shaped him into become a better fighter and father. programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep11

programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. programme.title: MotoGP : Qatar Airways Grand Prix of Qatar Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP : Qatar Airways Grand Prix of Qatar Highlights - Located in the Qatari desert, the Lusail circuit held its first event at the venue with the October 2004 Grand Prix of Qatar, won by Sete Gibernau. In 2008 Qatar celebrated the first floodlit Grand Prix in the history of the MotoGP World Championship and since 2007 Qatar has also hosted the season-opening race on the GP calendar

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Ribas vs. Namajunas
programme.desc: Prelims - A top ten contender in two weight classes, dynamic Brazilian star Amanda Ribas will make her case for a move into the flyweight title conversation when she competes in her first UFC main event against former world champion Rose Namajunas at the APEX in Las Vegas on March 24. Fresh from a Performance of the Night knockout of Luana Pinheiro, Ribas is ready for the biggest fight of her career against Namajunas, a world champion at 115 pounds now seeking gold in the flyweight division

programme.title: MotoGP : Grande PrÃ©mio de Portugal Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP : Grande Prmio de Portugal Highlights - The circuit was inaugurated by WorldSBK when they headed to Portugal for their final round of that season but its not just a racetrack. The Algarve Motorsports Park is a state-of-the-art complex which boasts the stunning race track, a go-kart track, an off-road park, a hotel, an apartment complex, a technology park and a sports complex it really is the bees knees. In terms of the actual circuit layout, the Autodromo Internacional do Algarve has 15 corners nine right, six left. The undulation in Portimao is incredible and the front straight will allow the MotoGP riders to really stretch the legs of their machines, before a unique downhill descend into Turn 1. Theres a reason it gets called a high-speed rollercoaster, its a thrill for riders and fans alike.
